short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It will automatically Delete All unneeded Firends on Social media

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FMFR | Mass Friends Remover 2025 is a powerful tool designed to simplify the management of your friend list. Whether you want to streamline your connections or remove unwanted friends, this extension offers an efficient way to handle large numbers of friends with ease.

Advantages:
Effortless Friend Management: Quickly remove multiple friends without having to navigate manually.
User-Friendly Interface: Intuitive design for smooth and straightforward usage.
Time-Saving Features: Select all or individual friends with just a few clicks.
Free Trial Limit: Please note that the free trial allows up to 5 uses. To continue accessing full functionality, consider upgrading to the full version.

How the Extension Works:
Set Language: Ensure your Facebook language is set to English (US) for optimal functionality, as the extension only operates in this language.
Access Friend List: Click the "Go to  Friend List Page" button to navigate to your friend list.
Load Data: After opening the friend list page, click the extension icon again and wait for the data to load. (Note: This data is temporary and will disappear once the page is closed.)
Manage Friends: Once the data is loaded, you can search for specific friends, select individual friends, or choose to select all.
Delete Friends: Click the "Delete Selected Friends" button to remove the chosen friends from your list.

Important Note: 
This extension is not authorized by Facebook and is not affiliated with Facebook Inc. It is an independent tool designed to enhance your user experience, but it does not represent or bear any trademarks of Facebook.
